name: Survive The Chaos
description:
Survive The Chaos

Survive The Chaos is a third person action game. Try to survive the chaotic events as long as possible, while you're playing as a ragdoll! Please download the game for better graphics.

How It's made

The game is made in Unity, I used blender to create the 3D models and Audiotool to make the music. There might be some bugs because the game is made within 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam.

If the game gets enough attention I might add more maps and chaotic events to the game!
